file.title: Compare

p.text: The command is used for comparing texts and in case they are identical it returns "0". In case they are non-identical the command returns "-1" when the first text is prior to the second text in alphabetical order. If the second text is prior in alphabetical order the command returns "1". Thus with the help of this command you can, for example, sort texts alphabetically.
